ARABIC: ذَٰلِكَ عَٰلِمُ ٱلْغَيْبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That is the Knower of the Unseen and the Visible, the Almighty, the Most Merciful:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Such is (He) the knower of the unknown and the known, the mighty and the merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He knows all that is beyond as well as all that is within a creature's sense-perception. He is the Most Mighty, the Most Compassionate,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He knows the unseen and the seen. He is Majestic and All-merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is the All Knowing – of all the hidden and the visible, the Most Honourable, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: That is He, the All-Knower of the unseen and the seen, the All-Mighty, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This is the Knower of the unseen and the seen, the Mighty the Merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He is the knower of the Unseen and the Visible, the All-mighty, the All-compassionate,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Such is the Knower of the Invisible and the Visible, the Mighty, the Merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Such is the Knower of the unseen and the visible, the Powerful, the Merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Such is the Knower of the unseen and the seen, the Mighty, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: That is the Knower of the sensible and the Unseen, the All-mighty, the All-merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Such is He, the Knower of all things, hidden and open, the Exalted (in power), the Merciful;-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: That is He, the All-Knower of the unseen and the seen, the All-Mighty, the Most Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He is the Knower of the Unseen and the Visible, the Almighty, the Most Merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: That is the Knower of the Invisible and the Visible, the Powerful, the Merciful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: That is the Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, the Exalted in Might, the Merciful,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [32:6] That, Creator and Director, is the Knower of the Unseen and the visible, that is, what is hidden from creatures and what is present before them, the Mighty, the Invincible in His kingdom, the Merciful, to those who are obedient to Him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Such) the Ordaining One (is the Knower of the invisible) what is hidden from the servants and will happen in the future (and the visible) that which the servants know and has already happened, (the Mighty) in retribution against the disbelievers, (the Merciful) towards the believers,
